snippet: Political turmoil could result in several scenarios, but the most damaging -- a populist party leading the nation into bankruptcy -- is improbable.
lead_paragraph: Political turmoil could result in several scenarios, but the most damaging -- a populist party leading the nation into bankruptcy -- is improbable.

headline.main: Greece Is Not Headed for the Door Just Yet
headline.print_headline: Greece Is Not Headed for the Door Just Yet
